content.query:
USE woca_ldw
GO

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'Individual/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'woca_data_src',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
GO

--Explore the datatypes and column_ordinals
EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''Individual/*.parquet'',
        DATA_SOURCE = ''woca_data_src'',
        FORMAT = ''PARQUET''
    ) AS [result]'
GO



-- Chech the maximum length of some columns
/*
MAX(LEN(contactid)),
MAX(LEN(mag_agegroupidname)),
MAX(LEN(gendercodelabel)),
MAX(LEN(mag_tribeprimaryidname)),
MAX(LEN(mag_tribeprimaryidname)),
MAX(LEN(mag_phoregistered)),
MAX(LEN(mag_ethnicityprimaryid)),
MAX(LEN(mag_physicaldisability)),
MAX(LEN(statuscodelabel)),
*/
SELECT
    MAX(LEN(statuscodelabel)) AS MAX_LEN
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'Individual/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'woca_data_src',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
GO


-- Select specific columns
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'Individual/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'woca_data_src',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) WITH (
        individual_id VARCHAR(50) 77,
        age_group_name VARCHAR(50) 61,
        gender_code_label VARCHAR(50) 69,
        date_of_birth VARCHAR(50) 103,
        tribe_primary_name VARCHAR(100) 90,
        pho_registered BIT 157,
        primary_ethnicity VARCHAR(50) 46,
        physical_disability BIT 81,
        status_code_label VARCHAR(20) 22
    ) AS [individuals]
GO


-- Select specific columns where age_group_name is not null
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'Individual/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'woca_data_src',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) WITH (
        individual_id VARCHAR(50) 77,
        age_group_name VARCHAR(50) 61,
        gender_code_label VARCHAR(50) 69,
        date_of_birth VARCHAR(50) 103,
        tribe_primary_name VARCHAR(100) 90,
        pho_registered BIT 157,
        primary_ethnicity VARCHAR(50) 46,
        physical_disability BIT 81,
        status_code_label VARCHAR(20) 22
    ) AS [individuals]
WHERE age_group_name IS NOT NULL
GO


-- Count the number of records 8634
SELECT
    COUNT(1) AS TOTAL
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'Individual/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'woca_data_src',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) WITH (
        individual_id VARCHAR(50) 77,
        age_group_name VARCHAR(50) 61,
        gender_code_label VARCHAR(50) 69,
        date_of_birth VARCHAR(50) 103,
        tribe_primary_name VARCHAR(100) 90,
        pho_registered BIT 157,
        primary_ethnicity VARCHAR(50) 46,
        physical_disability BIT 81,
        status_code_label VARCHAR(20) 22
    ) AS [individuals]
GO

-- Count the number of records when age_group_name is null 8547
SELECT
    COUNT(1) AS TOTAL
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'Individual/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'woca_data_src',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) WITH (
        individual_id VARCHAR(50) 77,
        age_group_name VARCHAR(50) 61,
        gender_code_label VARCHAR(50) 69,
        date_of_birth VARCHAR(50) 103,
        tribe_primary_name VARCHAR(100) 90,
        pho_registered BIT 157,
        primary_ethnicity VARCHAR(50) 46,
        physical_disability BIT 81,
        status_code_label VARCHAR(20) 22
    ) AS [individuals]
WHERE age_group_name IS NOT NULL
GO






-- Remove rows with the null in any of the listed columns
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'Individual/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'woca_data_src',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) WITH (
        individual_id VARCHAR(50) 77,
        age_group_name VARCHAR(50) 61,
        gender_code_label VARCHAR(50) 69,
        date_of_birth VARCHAR(50) 103,
        tribe_primary_name VARCHAR(100) 90,
        pho_registered BIT 157,
        primary_ethnicity VARCHAR(50) 46,
        physical_disability BIT 81,
        status_code_label VARCHAR(20) 22
    ) AS [individuals]
WHERE 
    age_group_name IS NOT NULL AND
    gender_code_label IS NOT NULL AND
    date_of_birth IS NOT NULL AND
    tribe_primary_name IS NOT NULL AND
    primary_ethnicity IS NOT NULL
GO

-- Remove rows with the null in any of the listed columns COUNT: 4725
SELECT
    COUNT(1) AS TOTAL
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'Individual/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'woca_data_src',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) WITH (
        individual_id VARCHAR(50) 77,
        age_group_name VARCHAR(50) 61,
        gender_code_label VARCHAR(50) 69,
        date_of_birth VARCHAR(50) 103,
        tribe_primary_name VARCHAR(100) 90,
        pho_registered BIT 157,
        primary_ethnicity VARCHAR(50) 46,
        physical_disability BIT 81,
        status_code_label VARCHAR(20) 22
    ) AS [individuals]
WHERE 
    age_group_name IS NOT NULL AND
    gender_code_label IS NOT NULL AND
    date_of_birth IS NOT NULL AND
    tribe_primary_name IS NOT NULL AND
    primary_ethnicity IS NOT NULL
GO





-- Remove rows with the null in all of the listed columns
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'Individual/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'woca_data_src',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) WITH (
        individual_id VARCHAR(50) 77,
        age_group_name VARCHAR(50) 61,
        gender_code_label VARCHAR(50) 69,
        date_of_birth VARCHAR(50) 103,
        tribe_primary_name VARCHAR(100) 90,
        pho_registered BIT 157,
        primary_ethnicity VARCHAR(50) 46,
        physical_disability BIT 81,
        status_code_label VARCHAR(20) 22
    ) AS [individuals]
WHERE 
    age_group_name IS NOT NULL OR
    gender_code_label IS NOT NULL OR
    date_of_birth IS NOT NULL OR
    tribe_primary_name IS NOT NULL OR
    primary_ethnicity IS NOT NULL
GO

-- Remove rows with the null in all of the listed columns COUNT: 8605
SELECT
    COUNT(1) AS TOTAL
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'Individual/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'woca_data_src',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) WITH (
        individual_id VARCHAR(50) 77,
        age_group_name VARCHAR(50) 61,
        gender_code_label VARCHAR(50) 69,
        date_of_birth VARCHAR(50) 103,
        tribe_primary_name VARCHAR(100) 90,
        pho_registered BIT 157,
        primary_ethnicity VARCHAR(50) 46,
        physical_disability BIT 81,
        status_code_label VARCHAR(20) 22
    ) AS [individuals]
WHERE 
    age_group_name IS NOT NULL OR
    gender_code_label IS NOT NULL OR
    date_of_birth IS NOT NULL OR
    tribe_primary_name IS NOT NULL OR
    primary_ethnicity IS NOT NULL
GO


/*
===============USE THIS TO CREATE SILVER VIEW==========
*/

SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'Individual/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'woca_data_src',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) WITH (
        individual_id VARCHAR(50) 77,
        age_group_name VARCHAR(50) 61,
        gender_code_label VARCHAR(50) 69,
        date_of_birth VARCHAR(50) 103,
        tribe_primary_name VARCHAR(100) 90,
        pho_registered BIT 157,
        primary_ethnicity VARCHAR(50) 46,
        physical_disability BIT 81,
        status_code_label VARCHAR(20) 22
    ) AS [individuals]
WHERE 
    age_group_name IS NOT NULL OR
    gender_code_label IS NOT NULL OR
    date_of_birth IS NOT NULL OR
    tribe_primary_name IS NOT NULL OR
    primary_ethnicity IS NOT NULL
GO
